name: The Light (itch) (hkst17)
description:
The player finds themselves in a small shack.

Upon leaving the shack, only a small sliver of light protects them from the ever encroaching darkness that threatens to swallow them whole.

Players are pushed further into this dangerous landscape, encountering many strange ghoulish creature while always having to make sure that the lighter stays lit, for without it, no hope exists.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Note: This game is played with a keyboard and mouse. Players have to figure out the main mechanic of the game, but don't give up there is more to the story! We have included atmospheric storytelling, so look out for some hidden objects and messages that you think make the story. Let me know what you think the story is about below! Thanks for playing and have fun!
